docs.summary:
The wix-stores-backend module contains functionality for working with your
 site's store from backend code.
description: To use the Stores API, import `wixStores` from the `wix-stores-backend` module:

docs.summary: Gets the current site visitor's shopping cart.
description: The `getCurrentCart()` function returns a Promise that resolves to the current

examples.title: Get the current site visitor's cart
body: *     "address":"235 West 23rd Street\nNew York, New York 10011\nUnited States"
*   "buyerNote": "This is a note from the buyer.",
*        "address":"235 West 23rd Street\nNew York, New York 10011\nUnited States"

params.name: productId
params.doc: The ID of the product whose availability is being checked.

params.name: choices
params.doc: Option choices to use when checking the product's availability.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - The availability information of the product.

docs.summary: Gets the availability of a product based on the specified option choices.
description: The `getProductOptionsAvailability()` function returns a Promise that is resolved
to a `ProductOptionsAvailability` object when the product's availability information
The information returned in the `selectedVariant` and `availableForPurchase`
properties reflects the option choices passed in using the `StoreProductChoices`
If the specified choices result in the selection of a single product variant,
that variant is returned in the `selectedVariant` property and the `availableForPurchase`
property indicates whether that product variant is available for purchase.
If the specified choices do not result in the selection of a single product variant,
no variant is returned in the `selectedVariant` property and the `availableForPurchase`

examples.title: Get a product's availability information

extra.description:
This example gets a product's availability information using an option choice.
 The product contains more than one option, so no variant is selected and the
 product with the specified choices is not available for purchase.

examples.title: Get a product's availability information

extra.description:
This example gets a product's availability information using multiple option choices.
 Since all the product's options have a corresponding choice, a variant is selected.

members.name: identityType
members.doc:
Buyer's identity.
 One of:

 + `"ADMIN"`: Buyer is the site owner.
 + `"MEMBER"`: Buyer is a logged-in site member.
 + `"VISITOR"`: Buyer is not logged in.
 + `"CONTACT"`: A contact has been created for the buyer.

docs.summary: An object representing a shopping cart.

examples.title: Get the current site visitor's cart
body: *     "address":"235 West 23rd Street\nNew York, New York 10011\nUnited States"
*   "buyerNote": "This is a note from the buyer.",
*        "address":"235 West 23rd Street\nNew York, New York 10011\nUnited States"

members.name: id
members.doc: Unique identifier of the shopping cart.

members.name: appliedCoupon
members.doc: Coupon applied in the shopping cart.

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: The order's units of weight. One of: `"KG"`, `"LB"`, or `"UNSPECIFIED_WEIGHT_UNIT"`.

docs.summary: An object representing a line item in a shopping cart.

examples.title: Get the current site visitor's cart

members.name: totalPrice
members.doc: Total price charged to the customer for all line items after any applicable discounts.

members.name: lineItemType
members.doc:
Type of the line item.
 One of:

 + `"DIGITAL"`: Digital item.
 + `"PHYSICAL"`: Physical item.
 + `"CUSTOM_AMOUNT_ITEM"`: Item with a custom price.
 + `"UNSPECIFIED"`: Type can't be classified due to an error.

docs.summary: An object representing a media item.

examples.title: Get the current site visitor's cart
body: *     "address":"235 West 23rd Street\nNew York, New York 10011\nUnited States"
*   "buyerNote": "This is a note from the buyer.",
*        "address":"235 West 23rd Street\nNew York, New York 10011\nUnited States"

members.name: mediaType
members.doc:
Type of the media item.
 One of:

 + `"IMAGE"`: Image item.
 + `"UNSPECIFIED_MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM"`: Media item type can't be classified due to an error.

docs.summary: An object representing a line item option.

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: The subtotal of all the order's line items, excluding tax.

members.name: shipping
members.doc: The total shipping price, including tax.

members.name: weight
members.doc: The total weight of the order's items.

members.name: quantity
members.doc: The total quantity of the the order's line items.

docs.summary: An object returned by the `getProductOptionsAvailability()` function representing the availability of a product.

members.name: availableForPurchase
members.doc: Whether the product with the specified option choices is available for purchase.

members.name: productOptions
members.doc: An object representing all the available options for a store product.

members.name: mainMedia
members.doc: Main product media item (image or video) URL.

members.name: selectedVariant
members.doc: The variant of the product selected using the specified option choices if there is one.

docs.summary: An object representing the product variant selected using the `getProductOptionsAvailability()` funtion.

members.name: sku
members.doc: Product variant stock keeping unit value.

members.name: formattedPrice
members.doc: Product variant price formatted with the currency.

members.name: formattedDiscountedPrice
members.doc: Discounted product variant price formatted with the currency.

members.name: visible
members.doc: Whether the product variant is shown in the store.

members.name: inStock
members.doc: Whether the product variant is in stock.

docs.summary: An object representing the selection of specific choices from the product's options.

members.name: optionKey
members.doc:
Value of the option. This key name is
 dependent on the options added to the product. For example, if a product
 has a size option, this key value will be something like "Size" and its value
 will be something like "Large".
